tasks.task_description: Create deployment scripts and Docker setup
Create API documentation and user guides

description: Phase 4: Production Readiness - final hardening, deployment preparation, monitoring, documentation, and production validation
context: Created production configuration management with production.json, comprehensive logging system with Logger.js including rotation and structured logging, health monitoring with HealthMonitor.js for system metrics, Docker setup with Dockerfile for containerized deployment, deployment script deploy.sh for automated setup, and backup system with backup.sh for data protection

Created user authentication system with AuthManager.js for session-based security, comprehensive API documentation in docs/API.md covering all endpoints and features, detailed user guide in docs/USER_GUIDE.md with installation and usage instructions, and final production validation test suite in __tests__/production/production.test.js covering all production readiness aspects. Phase 4 production readiness is now complete.
